entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Possible breaking change from 5.0.12 to 6.0.1 when using ExecutionStrategy property on RelationalDbContextOptionsBuilder #27018
  • EFCore 6 - Model is not getting validated when multiple columns have ValueGeneratedOnAdd() #27016
  • Hello all #27014
  • SqlServer: Translate string.IsNullOrEmpty with LIKE for column type char #27013

Closed

  • Migrations : dropping a column leaves the snapshot out of sync - is it ok to manually modify snapshots? #27017

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #27020
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Tweak SaveChangesAsync_accepts_changes_with_ConfigureAwait_true_22841 #27019
    auto-merge
  • Query: Mark SelectExpression as immutable after projection has been applied #27011
    auto-merge
  • Enable strict compilation #27009

Merged

  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #26999
  • [6.0.2] Call sync connection close instead of async #26943
    Servicing-approved
  • [6.0.2] Add the ability to break self-ref cycles between added and removed entities #26963
    Servicing-approved
  • [6.0.2] Restore the ability to break multiple FK cycles #26959
    Servicing-approved
  • [6.0.2] Handle duplicate property infos when sorting columns. #26958
    Servicing-approved
  • [6.0.2] Detach join entity when removing added relationship #26892
    Servicing-approved
  • [6.0.2] Query: Defer inline-ing owned navigation expansion till all joins are generated #26617
    Servicing-approved
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/5.0' => 'main' #27012
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/3.1' => 'main' #27010
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #27015
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0 #27000
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.x
  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1 #27002
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.x

Updated

  • Add Xunit.Abstractions to implicit usings #26996
  • SQL row value comparison syntax #26936
